page.title: 07 EVENTS-SOCIAL
page.content: Many social events have taken place just lately.Alot of them are held in the school and Village Hall-Discos the Wednesday Club which is instead of the W.I.holds monthly meetings. Parish Council meetings take place there,also dancing & Wedding receptions.The Mayfair took place about 14 years ago to revive the custom of a charter fair granted in the Middle Ages.Each year the school holds an annual Sports Day at the Recreation ground.The Horticultral Society hold an annual flower show at the Village Hall.The Choir and some villagers go carol singing around the village each Christmas.There has been a Chardstock Past and Present exhibition and Keep Fit classes are held in the Hall. There is a cricket club,a football club and a bowling club.They all use the Hall sometimes.
